detail_desc: Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Cotton lining.
Platform sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Fabric insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Straight-cut dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined hood. Dropped shoulder seams, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Caps in cotton twill with a small glittery appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sweatband in a cotton weave.
Short, wide, turtleneck jumper in a fine-knit stretch viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and a high slit in one side.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Hat in a soft knit with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved top in a fine knit with a sightly wider neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Weekend bag in a nylon weave with a zip and two handles at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap. Discreet outer compartment with a zip, an open compartment at one short side and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size approx. 22x34x40 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section and covered metal ring at the front. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a visible felted lining at the top and lacing at the front. Zip in one side, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Felted linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Jersey lining.
Oversized faux fur coat with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and welt side pockets. Lined.
Sleeveless lace top with a round neck, opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and a raw-edge scalloped hem. Partly lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.

Bikini top with underwired, gathered, thickly padded, moulded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck and an adjustable fastening at the back.

Sleeveless playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with elastication around the neckline and decorative ties at the front. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and scalloped hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides, a wide tie at one side and medium coverage at the back.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Wide, pull-on trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and straight legs.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and long, cuffed sleeves. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt. Unlined.

Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets for safe storage of small items.
Soft cotton jersey T-shirt in a slightly wider fit with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Lace cardigan with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a rounded hem and no buttons.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed viscose jersey with a deep neckline, decorative button band with sparkly stone buttons down the front and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit for a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Triangular cups with removable inserts and wide straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined gusset.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Long jumper in a soft knit in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in silk crêpe with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks in various colours.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with short, scallop-edged puff sleeves and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with imitation leather sections. High waist with two buttons and a zip fly, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Airy chiffon blouse with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs. Partly lined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective lenses.

Spacious, lightweight backpack in functional fabric with a roll-top closure at the top that can be folded down and fastened with a plastic fastener. Adjustable shoulder straps and a zipped inner pocket. The backpack can be folded and stored in its inner pocket when not in use.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal chain necklaces chains in various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Warm-lined boots in fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
A pair of metal hoop earrings.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool and alpaca blend with a turtle neck, long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short skirt in a crêpe weave with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and buttons down the front. Lined.
Shoulder bag in jacquard-weave cotton with tassels at the front, a zip at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 21.5x32 cm.
Full-length trousers in airy linen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative buttons at the top. Short sleeves with a tie detail, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Slippers in soft pile with embroidery and appliqués. Elastication at the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and viscose blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Trainers with panels in mesh, leather and suede. Padded tongue, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop front and back. Leather linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Blouse woven in a cotton blend with a sewn-in wrapover front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and a flared peplum.

Joggers in supersoft, washed, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly with a button. Front and back pockets, flap leg pockets, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Double-layered headband in a mohair-blend knit with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
